BreezeHost.net - Never feel cold again.....

BreezeHost offers high performance OpenVZ VPS in the US and NetherLand. All our VPS Nodes have minimum configuration of a Intel Server, Atleast 16 GB RAM with RAID-10 Hard Drives and they are all monitored 24x7x364.

BreezeHost All features below are included in all VPS's

• Equal CPU Share
• SolusVM Control Panel
• OpenVZ Technology
• FULL Root Access
• TUN/TAP Enabled by default
• Multiple Linux OS Choices
• Free Website Transfer
• Instant Setup
• 100mbps Port Speed
